column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Piggy Went To China: I think they alter their menu seasonally
column2: because I've ordered this on two separate occasions and I swear it was a different dish. First time I had it
column3: it was absolutely delicious. I grew up with Chinese food and was really impressed how they worked pretty authentic Sichuan flavors into traditionally Western biscuit
column5: sausage breakfast sandwich. Perfect egg. However
column6: the second time I ordered this when I was back a couple months later
column7: they had added strawberries to the sauce?? Kind of muddled up the perfect flavor they'd had before and made it weirdly sweet
column8: which didn't go well with the Sichuan pepper sauce. ): didn't enjoy it as much.
